Cat Burglar.card_desc: [Prowl] Deal 30% more damage from your first two Weapon Shots within 5s of Prowl ending.

Chase.card_desc: [Prowl] Increase the speed bonus of Prowl by {scale=10|10}%

Cut and Run.card_desc: [Armor] Kills and Eliminations grant {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 4s.

Featherlite.card_desc: [Prowl] Gain {scale=5|5}% damage reduction while using Prowl.

Fight or Flight.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 2s when you activate Nine Lives.

On Edge.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Reduce the Cooldown of Nine Lives by {scale=1|1}s.

Patch Up.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Nine Lives heals for an additional {scale=80|80}.

Persistence.card_desc: [Armor] Take {scale=4|4}% less damage when below 40% health.

Predation.card_desc: [Armor] Gain {scale=10|10}% increased Movement Speed when out of combat.

Rogue's Gambit.card_desc: [Armor] Eliminations reset the Cooldown of Pounce, and Pounce deals 10% more damage.

Scamper.card_desc: [Pounce] Gain {scale=10|10}% Movement Speed for 3s after activating Pounce.

Scar Tissue.card_desc: [Nine Lives] Gain {scale=5|5}% Damage Reduction for 2s after using Nine Lives.

Shred.card_desc: [Pounce] Reduce the Cooldown of Pounce by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Sixth Sense.card_desc: [Pounce] Gain {scale=5|5}% Damage reduction for 2s after using Pounce.

Street Justice.card_desc: [Pounce] Pounce now executes targets below 35% health.

Streetrunner.card_desc: [Prowl] Increase the duration of Prowl by {scale=0.5|0.5}s.

Walk it Off.card_desc: [Prowl] Heal for {scale=40|40} Health every second during Prowl.
